ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Zinc Carbonate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Zinc Pyrithione, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Dimethicone, Menthol, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydrochloric Acid, Magnesium Carbonate Hydroxide, Linalool, Magnesium Nitrate, Maris Sal, Sodium Polynaphthalenesulfonate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, CI 42090, CI 19140, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone.
